about_the_game:
Sun, sand, and girls

have entered the mystic world of Element X!

Meet


  • Tachibana Yuuri - friendly next door big sister who comes to the beach for delicious dinner ingredients! Her favorite dish is the neighbourhood’s famous takoyakis, often made exclusively for her little brother (with love)!
  • Aomori Azusa - heartbroken schoolgirl that fails to capture a certain classmate’s attention. She’s at the beach trying to release her anger by taking it out on pesky marine creatures.
  • Momoko - a long time stray cat until one friendly guy adopted her and gave her the best home she could have. Sadly, during one particularly disastrous day when sea creatures invaded the beach, she was separated from her owner. She has to fight for her way back.

New Features


  • Hand drawn, animated player skins of Tachibana, Aomori and Momoko!
  • New enemy skins of adorable pink octopi!
  • Enhanced lighting and map features including palm tree and the ocean!

Darkness Edition Exclusive


  • Player skins have unique variations that come with the Darkness Edition DLC!
detailed_description:
Sun, sand, and girls

have entered the mystic world of Element X!

Meet


  • Tachibana Yuuri - friendly next door big sister who comes to the beach for delicious dinner ingredients! Her favorite dish is the neighbourhood’s famous takoyakis, often made exclusively for her little brother (with love)!
  • Aomori Azusa - heartbroken schoolgirl that fails to capture a certain classmate’s attention. She’s at the beach trying to release her anger by taking it out on pesky marine creatures.
  • Momoko - a long time stray cat until one friendly guy adopted her and gave her the best home she could have. Sadly, during one particularly disastrous day when sea creatures invaded the beach, she was separated from her owner. She has to fight for her way back.

New Features


  • Hand drawn, animated player skins of Tachibana, Aomori and Momoko!
  • New enemy skins of adorable pink octopi!
  • Enhanced lighting and map features including palm tree and the ocean!

Darkness Edition Exclusive


  • Player skins have unique variations that come with the Darkness Edition DLC!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Element X: Seaside Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7820X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Enhance your bullet hell experience with a new set of colorful characters - Tachibana Yuuri, Aomori Azusa, and Momoko! They fight with unique purposes on this octopus infested beach!
